data.text: me and my friends went to blubar novotel wtc and we are tired the whole day,this smart lady namely frances greet us with a smile and assist us to our table,she explain us about the live band on that saturday night and she suggest us what to drink  and to eat‚≠êÔ∏èwe had a amazing night after a tiring day @ work,all the staff our polite and smart they had a good ambiance,nice choices of drinks, and nice live band,i will highly recomended this blubar @ novotel world trade center  and i will tell to my friends and family to come to this superb,nice,relaxing and chill bar in dubai they deserve 10‚≠êÔ∏èü´°
data.title: highly recomended‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è blubar novotel wtc

data.text:
Excellent place to stay  amazing food  by the very kind gentleman over there.. 
Over all valued . The guy on the    live section was really sweetheart.  And as well as very  master in his work thanks to had lovely breakfast... I must recommend this place to visit and stay as well as food
data.title: Valueadded

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your amazing review! We're thrilled to hear that you had an excellent experience during your stay, especially with our amazing food and the kind Heartist in our live section. Providing wonderful experiences for our guests is what we strive for, and we're delighted that you found our service to be exceptional.  We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay.

Best regards,
Dynne Binua  - Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: Anoop Dhondoo

data.text: The hotel has a nice location especially when you attending an event in WTC area, it‚Äôs right next to the exhibition building, so very convenient and only need around 5 minutes walk. The room are great and ok in size. The only downside is that you have to wait for several minutes before the hot water ready, it‚Äôs a bit annoying since the weather tends to be colder in February period. The front desk is also took quite a long time to  process the check in. Other than that, the overall experience is still great.
data.title: Business visit

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We're glad to hear that you found our hotel's location convenient, especially for events at the World Trade Centre. We appreciate your positive comments about our rooms and overall experience.

However, we apologize for any inconvenience caused by the delay in hot water availability and the wait time during check-in. Rest assured, we'll address these issues promptly to improve our guests' experience in the future.

Your feedback is invaluable to us, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for an even better stay next time. 

Best regards,
Dynne Binua - Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: Anoop Dhondoo

data.text: It was very comfortable and a solo traveler very safe tooüëç The hospitality was top notch and they also allowed me to check out late. I was travelling for business and it was 1 min walking distance from the world trade centre. I will keep coming back to Novotel world trade centre
data.title: Very comfortable

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your wonderful review! We're delighted to hear that you had a very comfortable stay and felt safe throughout your time with us. Providing a warm hospitality is our priority, and we're glad to know that you were pleased with our service. We're also happy that our flexible policy was convenient for you, and that our proximity to the World Trade Centre made your business trip more convenient. We truly appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back to Novotel World Trade Centre for future stays!

Best regards,
Dynne Binua - Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: Anoop Dhondoo

data.text: Great housekeeping by Abhishek and lahru and Krishna , the hotel is super and the guys who cleaning our room they also super cleaning is very good sepcial thanks to Abhishek housekeeping supervisor and his team doing great work near to metro and good location good wifi all staff also friendly
data.title: Super housekeeping by Abhishek

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your fantastic review! We're thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with our housekeeping team, especially Abhishek, Lahru, and Krishna. It's wonderful to know that they provided superb cleaning service and contributed to making your stay enjoyable. We're also pleased that you found our hotel to be in a convenient location near the metro, with friendly Heartists. We'll be sure to pass on your special thanks to Abhishek and the whole tea for their exceptional work. We look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay in the future!

Best regards,
Dynne Binua - Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: Anoop Dhondoo
